Concept: engineering problem

Description

The problem that requires engineering and scientific methods to solve

Examples:
- Increasing the range of an EV
- Improving the efficiency of robotic sorting
- Increasing the battery life a consumer electronic


Usage List:

  • Appears as engineering problem in Diagram A1: Design Product in in Production in a circular economy .
  • Appears as engineering problem in Diagram A12: Determine customer profile in in Production in a circular economy .
